selected_quotes: 'Wildfires are ranging in the Mediterranean. What can we learn?' .@luketkelly @ctforestal
Heat drought have fuelled fierce fires in Italy this summer. @SciMelb's @luketkelly discusses what we can learn
#Wildfires are common across Europe, but could better forest management reduce risk?
Wildfires are raging in the Mediterranean. What can we learn? Interessant recull de propostes!
Muy bueno este artículo con la participación de los compañeros del

citation.abstract: Italy, Portugal and Spain have all gone up in flames in recent weeks, highlighting the need to rethink how Mediterranean countries protect people and save ecosystems.
